entry.string: git config --global user.email jenkins@gosmartlog.com git config --global user.name jenkins rm -rf devops-deployment-stm-sme git clone https://${BITBUCKET_USERNAME}:${BITBUCKET_PASSWORD}@bitbucket.org/smartlogtms/devops-deployment-stm-sme.git cd devops-deployment-stm-sme sed -i 's+744004065806.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/stm-sme-be.*+744004065806.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/stm-sme-be@sha256:8ef47c45fc9e2fc043ce000c26932ed0edb562a5e905070222ccb1f3b8626742+g' ./stm-be-deliveree/production-sme/be/.argocd-source.yaml git add ./stm-be-deliveree/production-sme/be/.argocd-source.yaml for file in ./stm-be-deliveree/production-sme/be/deploy*.yaml; do sed -i "s/\(date:\s*\)'[^']*'/\1'1680561486'/" "$file";git add "$file";done
